Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Mummy mask
Description: Mummy mask with a golden face, sculpted in relief. The eyes are painted in black. Note the presence of earrings. The wig is decorated with stylised strands of hair. The head band is painted on the forehead and is decorated with circles in relief. In the middle, an udjat-eye pendant is depicted, also in relief.
